mapper.select: select count(*) from customer where c_name like #{keyword}
mapper.insert: insert into customer(c_name, c_id, c_pwd, c_email, c_birth, c_status, c_gen) values(#{c_name}, #{c_id}, #{c_pwd}, #{c_email}, #{c_birth}, #{c_status}, #{c_gen})
mapper.update: update customer set c_name=#{c_name}, c_id=#{c_id}, c_pwd=#{c_pwd}, c_email=#{c_email}, c_birth=#{c_birth}, c_status=#{c_status}, c_gen=#{c_gen}, c_mod_dt=NOW() where c_seq=#{c_seq}
mapper.select: select c_seq from customer order by c_seq desc limit 1
